notes: Covers: (1) follow-up deferrals without concrete date (must ask for timeframe; attempt #2 includes booking link), (2) Meeting Requested replies that were suppressed by 'intentional routing' and/or hijacked by followup_task drafts, (3) lead-provided scheduler link routing (Process 5 manual-only), (4) false 'Meeting Booked' from text-only messages without provider evidence.
